sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react';
import { Link, NavLink } from 'react-router-dom';
import {
  MDBContainer,
  MDBNavbar,
  MDBNavbarBrand,
  MDBNavbarToggler,
  MDBIcon,
  MDBNavbarNav,
  MDBNavbarItem,
  MDBNavbarLink,
  MDBCollapse,
} from 'mdb-react-ui-kit';

export default function App() {
  const [openBasic, setOpenBasic] = useState(false);

  // Retrieve username from local storage
  const username = localStorage.getItem('userName');
  const logoutUser=()=>{
    window.localStorage.removeItem("userName")
    window.localStorage.removeItem("token")
  }
  return (
    <MDBNavbar expand='lg' light bgColor='light'>
      <MDBContainer fluid>
        <MDBNavbarBrand href='#'>Url Shortner</MDBNavbarBrand>

        <MDBNavbarToggler
          aria-controls='navbarSupportedContent'
          aria-expanded='false'
          aria-label='Toggle navigation'
          onClick={() => setOpenBasic(!openBasic)}
        >
          <MDBIcon icon='bars' fas />
        </MDBNavbarToggler>

        <MDBCollapse navbar open={openBasic}>
          <MDBNavbarNav className='mr-auto mb-2 mb-lg-0'>
            

            <MDBNavbarItem>
              <NavLink to="">
                <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' href='#'>
                  Home
                </MDBNavbarLink>
              </NavLink>
            </MDBNavbarItem>

            <MDBNavbarItem>
              <NavLink to="GetUrls">
                <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' href='#'>
                  My URLs
                </MDBNavbarLink>
              </NavLink>
            </MDBNavbarItem>

            {!username ? (
              <>
                <MDBNavbarItem>
                  <NavLink to="Signup">
                    <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' href='#'>
                      SignUp
                    </MDBNavbarLink>
                  </NavLink>
                </MDBNavbarItem>

                <MDBNavbarItem>
                  <NavLink to="SignIn">
                    <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' href='#'>
                      SignIn
                    </MDBNavbarLink>
                  </NavLink>
                </MDBNavbarItem>
              </>
            ) : null}
            {username ? (
              <>
              <MDBNavbarItem>
                <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' href='#'>
                  Welcome, {username}
                </MDBNavbarLink>
              </MDBNavbarItem>
              <MDBNavbarItem onClick={logoutUser}>
                <MDBNavbarLink active aria-current='page' >
                  Logout
                </MDBNavbarLink>
              </MDBNavbarItem>
              
              </>
            ) : null}
          </MDBNavbarNav>
        </MDBCollapse>
      </MDBContainer>
    </MDBNavbar>
  );
}
